name: Cynexis Media
tagline: Web Design + SEO + App Development Firm
description:
Cynexis Media is a Columbus, Ohio, based website design, app development, branding and internet marketing agency which specializes in professional SEO, custom mobile & web application development, responsive web design, brand & identity, and search engine marketing. We are the bridge between your ideas and your business's success in the digital world.
With backgrounds in business, our web designers, online marketers, and application developers blend design ideas with execution strategies to build solutions that lead to a favorable return on your investment.
Well done is better than well said. Client service is not a department, it’s everyone’s job. In our way of working, we attach a great deal of importance to humility and honesty; with respect for human values, we promise to serve our customers with integrity. As evidenced from your first phone call, each client will realize we love what we do. We believe that each client has within them the strength, the knowledge, and the passion for mutually beneficial results.
Here are just a few of the many clients we’ve worked with over the years:
MOUNT CARMEL, Argus, The Ohio State University, Trinity Homes, Mc Graw Hill and more.
